Message:
I was a war orphan in
a country full of civil wars.

Even so, I refuse to live
just whining about
how terrible my life is.

All I know is the battlefield,
and that’s why I know
there are things I can do.

Having a merchant on
the battlefield would
save many lives.

I’ve witnessed many that
would’ve been saved if
they just had resources.

...If someone seeks help,
deliver what they need.
